FULLNAME_MIN_LENGTH_3: Full Name must be at least 3 characters
MOBILE_INVALID_FORMAT: Phone must be in +CC XXX XXX... format with valid length
PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH_6: Password must be at least 6 characters
PASSWORD_NEEDS_LOWERCASE: Password must contain a lowercase letter
PASSWORD_NEEDS_UPPERCASE: Password must contain an uppercase letter
PASSWORD_NEEDS_SPECIAL_CHAR: Password must contain a special character
